channel.title: Personal-Journey on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Personal-Journey on Alex's Blog

item.title: The Running Plateau: My Eight-Year Search for Speed
item.description: Hi, this is Alex, CTO and Co-founder of Netrin. This post chronicles my unlikely transformation from a kid who couldn’t run a single lap without gasping for air to someone who now comfortably logs half marathons.
